settings.prescriptxt: *Active ingredients have been studied separately, with each showing results of improvement in hair regrowth after 3-6 months of use.

settings.testimonial_text: Between month 4-5 the progress blew me away! I went back to my barber and he couldn’t believe it.
I noticed my hair getting thicker in places that was thin and it had more body. I have my confidence back.
The difference was very clear and fast forward 6 months my hair looks amazing!
Been a huge joy for me. Within 5 months, I got my edge back and my hair and confidence is restored!
I began to see progress in less than 3 months. My brother saw my progress and has begun using it!
I've had thinning at the crown for many years. Now it's definitely filling in. I love that!

settings.title: Answer a few questions
settings.text: Tell us about your health and goals

settings.title: Get a personalized treatment plan
settings.text: A licensed provider will review your info and recommend the best treatment

settings.title: Free shipping
settings.text: All prescription treatment ships free, if prescribed

settings.title: Finasteride helps prevent hair loss
settings.text: Protect hair follicles and keep DHT hormone levels in check.

settings.title: Minoxidil kickstarts new growth
settings.text: Wake up dormant follicles and increase how long they stay in the active growth phase.

settings.title: Hair begins to regrow in as little as 3-6 months
settings.text: Finasteride and minoxidil work together to promote regrowth and thicker hair.
